body_html: Well i don't see a Go equivalent of python's tf.Variable. I was trying to work out a TensorFlow tutorial in Go instead of python but the absence of Variable made it impossible. I did spot some 'low-level' operators that seem related to variables, and thought maybe the Variable functionality can be built on top of that?

body: Well i don't see a Go equivalent of python's tf.Variable. I was trying to work out a TensorFlow tutorial in Go instead of python but the absence of Variable made it impossible. I did spot some 'low-level' operators that seem related to variables, and thought maybe the Variable functionality can be built on top of that?
